original_text:
That your trust may be in the Lord,
    I have made them known to you today, even to you.
korean_text: 내가 네게 여호와를 의뢰하게 하려 하여 이것을 오늘 특별히 네게 알게 하였노니

sentences.original_text: That your trust may be in the Lord
I have made them known to you today
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 오늘 당신에게 그것들을 알려 주었느니라
